hero.title: Guiding students to stronger applications with structure, clarity, and strategy
hero.subtitle: We help students craft standout college applications with a proven, student-led system.

hero-cards.title: Our story
hero-cards.description: Two Stern students who transferred into a top business program, looking to help out fellow transfers

hero-cards.title: Results that compound
hero-cards.description: From state flagships to top privates, we help families target fit and ROI, not just brand names.

hero-cards.title: Calm, clear, consistent
hero-cards.description: Weekly check ins, crisp templates, and lightweight dashboards keep students moving without burnout.

hero-cards.title: Always reachable
hero-cards.description: Fast feedback on drafts and decisions when it matters most.

founders.name: Krissh Kolhatkar
founders.desc: Co founder. Student at NYU Stern majoring in Finance and Statistics. Systems, dashboards, and essay frameworks that reduce stress and raise clarity.

founders.name: Arnav Raghuvanshi
founders.desc: Co founder. Student at NYU Stern majoring in Finance. School list strategy, interview prep, and high leverage feedback.

about.sub: We are a student led advisory focused on clarity, craft, and confidence. Your story should sound like you and stand up under pressure.
about.title: About Us

process.disclaimer: Vita provides advising and coaching only; we do not guarantee admission to any institution.

processes.title: Discover
processes.desc: Free consultation to map goals, constraints, and a first draft school list.

processes.title: Plan
processes.desc: Calendar, essay prompts, and a shared workspace so everyone stays aligned.

processes.title: Build
processes.desc: Weekly sprints on essays, activities, and recommendations with tight feedback loops.

processes.title: Polish
processes.desc: Final QA, interview practice, and financial aid checks before you submit.

process.sub: Simple steps. Clear deliverables. No surprises.
process.title: Our process

features.name: Essay Essentials
features.desc: Strong structure. Clear voice. Better essays.

features.name: Application Review
features.desc: A sharper, stronger application — reviewed, refined, and ready to submit.

features.name: Guidance & Strategy
features.desc: Guidance that sharpens your LORs, clubs, and transfer story.

packs.title: Starter Pack – 5 hours
packs.desc: 5 hours of online/offline time, used however you need

features: Live 1-on-1 editing via Google Meet & Docs
session.title: Description of sessions

services.sub: Every package includes school list strategy, essay calendars, weekly check-ins, and fast feedback. Hourly add-ons available.
services.title: Services & Pricing

faqs.question: What is the difference between Offline/Online Hours?
faqs.answer: Offline support covers planning, editing, and review work done independently. Online support includes live calls, guidance, and real-time feedback.

faqs.question: How early should we start?
faqs.answer: Starting in the first year of college is ideal, but we also support rising high school seniors on quicker timelines.

faqs.question: Do you write essays for students?
faqs.answer: No. We coach structure, voice, and clarify so the work is authentic and strong.
